sentences.english: I admire him for having the strength and the courage to rebuild his life.
sentences.chinese: 我敬佩他那种为重建人生而体现出的勇气和毅力。

sentences.english: A great example of perseverance and what it takes.
sentences.chinese: 是毅力和毅力必备条件的一个好例子。

sentences.english: A great example of perseverance and what it takes.
sentences.chinese: 是毅力和毅力必备条件的一个好例子。

sentences.english: It makes me understand that perseverance. makes the impossible possible.
sentences.chinese: 它让我懂得毅力可以把不可能变成可能。

sentences.english: Of course willpower is not all there is to resisting temptation.
sentences.chinese: 当然光靠毅力来抵制诱惑是不够的。

sentences.english: A thin and weak girl susceptible to diseases, she wrote one inspiring novel after another with her strong will.
sentences.chinese: 以她坚强的毅力写出了一部催人奋进的小说。

sentences.english: I talked already about tenacity versus short term results.
sentences.chinese: 我已经谈了毅力和短期成果之间的平衡。

sentences.english: To be a nurse calls for endurance and patience.
sentences.chinese: 作一名护士需要有毅力和耐心。

sentences.english: We hope everyone can have more courage and perseverance to walk the Tzu Chi path.
sentences.chinese: 我希望大家有更大的勇气和毅力，走慈济的菩萨道。

sentences.english: We played really well, showed character and deserved the three points.
sentences.chinese: 我们踢得非常精彩，展现全取三分的决心和毅力。

sentences.english: He had controlled himself with extreme effort and suffered in silence.
sentences.chinese: 他一声不吭，以极大的毅力默默忍受着疼痛。

sentences.english: But he needed immense patience to deal with Cairo’s bureaucracy.
sentences.chinese: 然而他需要巨大的毅力去和开罗的官员周旋。

sentences.english: One is likely to succeed only when one has worked with whole-hearted devotion and perseverance.
sentences.chinese: 一个成功的可能只有一个人曾与全心的奉献，毅力。

sentences.english: It forges persistence which is an essential trait required for achieving success.
sentences.chinese: 它锻造毅力，而这是取得成功所需的一个必备特征。

sentences.english: Wit and will strive for victory.
sentences.chinese: 智慧加毅力，拚搏能胜利。

sentences.english: Although he's less talented, won by sheer dogged persistence.
sentences.chinese: 他啼天赋郴高，但全凭坚韧赌毅力援得撂胜利。

definition: to persevere unremittingly (idiom); to keep going until the end
to keep on fighting in spite of all setbacks (idiom)/to be undaunted by repeated setbacks/to be indomitable
